name: roup - devcontainer (Ubuntu 24.04)
postCreateCommand: bash -lc "echo LLVM_VERSION=$LLVM_VERSION; echo RUST_VERSION=$RUST_VERSION; if command -v clang >/dev/null 2>&1; then clang --version | head -n1; elif command -v clang-21 >/dev/null 2>&1; then clang-21 --version | head -n1; else echo 'clang not found'; fi; RUST_OK=0; if command -v rustc >/dev/null 2>&1; then rustc --version || true; else echo 'rustc not found'; RUST_OK=1; fi; if command -v cargo >/dev/null 2>&1; then cargo --version || true; else echo 'cargo not found'; RUST_OK=1; fi; if [ $RUST_OK -eq 0 ]; then echo 'Rust smoke test: PASS'; else echo 'Rust smoke test: FAIL - run: curl --proto =https --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh'; fi"
